t: Requirements and tips for enrolling a brand in Amazon Brand Registry ...
s: June 4, 2024 - To enroll a brand in Brand Registry, your brand must have an active registered trademark or a pending trademark registration. That trademark must be a text-based mark (word mark) or an image-based mark with words, letters, or numbers (design mark) from approved government intellectual property (IP) offices. ... Securing IP rights can be complex and costly, but it’s a necessary step to protect your name, logo, product ...

t: Nike to resume selling directly on Amazon for first time since 2019
s: 4 days ago - Nike will resume selling its products directly to Amazon in the U.S. for the first time since 2019, CNBC has confirmed. The sneaker giant stopped selling its goods wholesale on Amazon six years ago as part of a push to distribute more directly to customers and have greater control over the shopping experience.
